message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $13,500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high. I could meet you halfway - how about $12,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to go down to $12,200?
